attributes.action: make the newspaper editors, journalists, photographers to act responsibly and not lie and not invade a persons privacy, be it public or celebrity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the general public and celebrities alike are fed up with lies being printed in the press and fed up of photographers snapping happily away looking for a dirty story.  They use dirty tactics and "mis-quote" people. It's time they faced up to responsiblity and responsible reporting. End this Media Hell now and let people live their lives.
